title: StaffingReferenceIdsType
description: A collection of identifiers related to a staffing assignment of a resource.

assignmentId.description: An identifier for a particular engagement or assignment of a staffing resource.

requestForQuotationId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingRFQ document.

quoteId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingQuote document.

actionId.description: Used to specify a reference to a StaffingAction document.

masterOrderId.description: Reference to a master order or project. Used to associate multiple orders.
